paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: Mean age 56.8 years at onset, 58.6 years at diagnosis; 57.9% male.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The mean age of patients at symptom onset was lower than the mean age at diagnosis, revealing a diagnosis delay of 1.8 years.
Patients had a family history of ATTRv in 63.2% of cases.

functional_data.summary: The study involved complete sequencing of the TTR gene.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families as 63.2% of patients had a family history of ATTRv.
variants.additional_notes: Val50Met was the most common mutation in both patients (84.2%) and asymptomatic carriers (77.9%).
key_quotes: Val50Met was the most frequent mutation in both groups.
Patients had a family history of ATTRv in 63.2% of cases.

patients.demographics: Mean age 56.8 years at onset, 58.6 years at diagnosis; 57.9% male.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The study included 86 AC of a pathogenic mutation in the TTR gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was consistent across multiple mentions of the same variants.
